TopicTitle: A question about the Sentinel and the Asteroid Day Mod

Articles.Content:
Hey, you know the Sentinel from the mod, well, I wonder if multiple sentinels on the same craft will act like separete Sentinels, making detection quicker, or if I need to make a mothership to dispense these little buggers.

Oh and, how do you get that thing to between Moho and Sun without spending the entire observable universe in fuel?

Sorry I don't know about multiple sentinels, the impression I got is that it doesn't matter how many you have.

The only time I got that close ot the sun is an insane contract requiring me to put a satellite in low and highly inclined orbit around the sun. I did it with ion engines, it's tricky but Eve aerobraking or sling shot might be another option if you can set it up.

Oh and, how do you get that thing to between Moho and Sun without spending the entire observable universe in fuel?

Ion "Dawn" engine or assorted similar modded engines (low TWR high ISP). Not like burn times matter for a Kerbol orbit and a lifter capable of sending, say, a Duna lander, will give you almost the observable universe in dV when most of that mass is xenon instead of a lander.
